global_message: üîê Welcome to the Voice Vault! This secure vault contains confidential information accessible only through voice authentication. All authorized personnel have been granted access to their respective compartments.

user_notes.federico: Personal access code: F3D3R1C0-2024. Your secure notes: Project Alpha deadline is December 15th. Meeting with investors scheduled for next week. Backup encryption key stored in safe deposit box #7.
